msg: Switch the last function in FSX/rep-cache to using the 2-pool paradigm.
(svn_fs_x__get_rep_reference): Switch declaration to the new paradigm.

author: stefan2
msg: In FSX, switch svn_fs_x__dag_clone_child() to the 2-pool paradigm.
Propagate that change along the call stack.
(svn_fs_x__dag_clone_child): Change declaration to use two pools.
(svn_fs_x__dag_clone_child): SUBPOOL has been replaced by SCRATCH_POOL.
Everything that is not the result needs to
(make_path_mutable): Switch this caller to the 2-pool paradigm as well.
